Text:
Something is up with my connection. Strangely I can reseed completed torrents just fine, but try to see this one and I see failed incoming connections.

Already quit/restarted uTorrent and disable firewall to test. Haven't installed this month's round of patches so will do that and reboot; hope that fixes it.

Please be patient. Thanks.
All seems well now... seeding away. Time for bed. :^)
Thank you from a big fan of Mike Leigh films.
You're welcome, Scottie Lass. I was hoping you'd find this one linked from High Hopes. :^)
